data.name: Cleanup on Isle Goblin
data.detailed_description:
Hey everyone! I'd like to start by saying that this game is still in production, and it may be a bit of time before it releases. If you think it looks interesting and would like to be kept in the loop feel free to wishlist or follow our development logs on YouTube to stay in the loop! Love you all!

Your beautiful island has been invaded by destructive humans, and complete annihilation of the landscape seems inevitable. Armed with only your monster friends and the resources available, do you have what it takes to revert the island to its former glory?

With mechanics inspired by Crypt of the Necrodancer, combined with the community and development aspects of Stardew Valley and Harvest Moon, Cleanup on Isle Goblin offers a blend of unique combat and intriguing story. The island is yours to rebuild as you please, with much to explore and learn along the way.

Features

  • Rebuild the crumbling town, and fill it with inhabitants to help you on your journey.
  • Fight your way through abandoned dungeons to find treasure from ages past.
  • Craft hundreds of items from the resources you find.
  • Form meaningful relationships with various NPC's and gain their help in your plight against the human threat.

data.short_description: Isle Goblin has been invaded by destructive humans, and complete annihilation of the delicate ecosystem is inevitable. Armed with only your monster friends and the resources available, do you have what it takes to revert the island to its former glory?
